timeline.message:
Add conditional property to GCP core auto configuration

spring.cloud.gcp.core.enabled property enables/disables the auto configuration

timeline.bodyText: We should also add it to spring-cloud-gcp/spring-cloud-gcp-autoconfigure/src/main/resources/META-INF/additional-spring-configuration-metadata.json.
timeline.author: meltsufin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -40,8 +41,10 @@
  * @author Mike Eltsufin
  * @author Elena Felder
  * @author Chengyuan Zhao
+ * @author Serhat Soydan
  */
 @Configuration
+@ConditionalOnProperty(name = "spring.cloud.gcp.core.enabled", havingValue = "true", matchIfMissing = true)

timeline.message:
Add new property to additional spring config metadata

spring.cloud.gcp.core.enabled is added
